youtube:
Ukufumana ulwazi lwakho lwe-RTMP yeYouTube, ngena kwiakhawunti yakho yakwaYouTube emva koko uye ku-YEKA > Yiya ngqo. Emva koko uya kubona isikrini esilandelayo:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Khuphela u-"Stream URL" kwaye uyifake kwindawo ethi "Cola i-RTMP URL apha" indawo. Emva koko, kopisha "Iqhosha lokusasaza" kwaye ulincamathisele kwindawo ethi "Iqhosha lokusasaza". Cofa u-"Hamba uLive" ukuqalisa ukusasaza ngokuqhubekayo.
{{rtmpLive}}
facebook:
Uyakwazi ukusasaza kwiprofayile yakho nge-RTMP ukusuka kuFacebook Yenza iphepha elibukhoma (kwaye ucofe uYenza ukusasazwa okubukhoma) okanye ngokucofa iqhosha eliphilayo kwindawo yokudala yephepha okanye iprofayile onqwenela ukusasaza kuyo. Uza kuziswa kuMvelisi kaFacebook ophilayo.
Skrolela ezantsi ngezantsi komdlali wepreview. Qinisekisa phantsi ko-"Qalisa" ukuba imenyu eyehlayo isetelwe ukusebenzisa amaqhosha okusasaza. Uya kufumana i-URL ye-RTMP kunye neSitshixo sokuSasaza sale ndawo. (Qaphela: Umboniso wakho wevidiyo usabonakala kwikona esezantsi ekunene.) {{facebookLive}} Khuphela u-"URL yeseva" kwaye uyifake kwindawo ethi "Coca i-RTMP URL apha" indawo. Emva koko, kopisha "Iqhosha lokusasaza" kwaye ulincamathisele kwindawo ethi "Iqhosha lokusasaza". Cofa u-"Yiya bukhoma" ukuqalisa ukusasaza ngokuqhubekayo.
{{rtmpLive}}
